name: Midnight at the Haunted Mansion
description:
Enter a haunted mansion and collect gold coins. 

  • Jump to avoid deadly traps!
  • Slide down walls without adult supervision!
  • Throw wooden stakes at the faces of sketchy looking ghouls!
  • Collect valuable gold coins and save them for retirement!

How To Play

You run automatically, and control your jumping and attacking.

A or L to Jump

Q or P to Throw Stakes

(This control layout allows you to choose which side of the keyboard you prefer to have jump/attack)

You get one stake per room so use it wisely!
